message: Let's split it 60/40. It's a good deal for both of us right now.
Let's be fair to each other, Alice. I understand this offer benefits me more in the long run due to the inflation difference, but it's still a reasonable split considering we're only in round 2.
Bob, I understand your point about the inflation difference, but your offer in round 2 wasn't fair to me in the short term. Let's meet in the middle with a 55/45 split in my favor this time.
